paper_abstract: A new cell centred Lagrangian Godunov scheme for shock hydrodynamics is proposed. The new method uses a transient dual grid to define the motion of the vertices in a way that is consistent with the geometric conservation law. Crown Copyright (C) 2010 Published by Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A cell centred Lagrangian Godunov scheme for shock hydrodynamics
